comments.body: Project: PIVX-based blockchain and web wallet - another interesting project developed on a turnkey basis by our teamName: Yoda Development of a POS cryptocurrency with low transaction costs and staking. In addition to the cryptocurrency itself, it includes the development of a web wallet, a desktop wallet and applications for iOS and Android, an investor's personal account and a referral program. The personal account structure includes elements of the following functionality: Web wallet, Balance management, Address generation, Initiation, Transactions, Processing of all blockchain transactions, Two-factor Google authorization, Two-factor Google transaction confirmation, Functionality for restoring the wallet access phrase, 12 words, Building a network structure on blockchain transactions.Stack: Laravel, C++, Bitcoin

comments.author: FreeBlock
comments.body: Rest assured, it is not for nothing that we claim to have experience in the field of blockchain and know all the issues that may arise when writing smart contracts.Thanks to our long experience, we know what to pay attention to, because as in any software development, writing smart contracts can encounter the following difficulties:1. Complexity of programming language: Smart contracts can be written in various programming languages such as Solidity, Rust, etc. Each language has its own characteristics and requires special knowledge.2. Security: Smart contracts may contain vulnerabilities that can lead to loss of funds or security breaches. It is necessary to carefully check the code for vulnerabilities and take measures to eliminate them.3. Platform Limitations: Smart contracts operate in a blockchain environment, which means they are limited by the capabilities of that platform. For example, some blockchains do not support performing complex calculations or accessing external data.4. Testing Difficulty: Testing smart contracts can be difficult due to platform limitations and the need to simulate different use cases.5. Updating contracts: Changing smart contracts can be difficult due to their immobility and immutability. It is necessary to carefully consider the architecture of the contract and the possibility of updating it in the future.Our company has the knowledge and experience in developing such software, which guarantees you a reliable and high-quality product.We will always be happy to advise you regarding your technical specifications and implement your project.

comments.author: FreeBlock
comments.created_time: September 27, 2023, 06:40:01 PMLast edit: September 28, 2023, 07:24:16 AM by FreeBlock
comments.body: Cryptocurrency exchanges are online platforms that allow users to buy, sell or exchange cryptocurrency. They have several features that should be considered when using:1. Anonymity: Many cryptocurrency exchanges do not require users to provide personal information such as name and email address. This makes using cryptocurrency exchanges more anonymous than traditional banking transactions.2. High volatility: Cryptocurrency prices can fluctuate significantly over a short period of time. This means that users can make big profits or lose money depending on how quickly the price changes.3. Availability of commissions: Cryptocurrency exchangers usually charge commissions for conducting transactions. These may vary depending on the platform and type of operation.4. Security: Cryptocurrency exchangers must be safe to use. However, some platforms may fall victim to cyber attacks, which can lead to leakage of user data and loss of funds.5. Country restrictions: In some countries, the use of cryptocurrency exchangers may be prohibited or limited. Users should ensure that they comply with local laws and regulations when using the platform.In general, cryptocurrency exchangers provide the opportunity to quickly and conveniently trade cryptocurrencies. However, users must be careful and take security measures to avoid losing their funds.We have experience in developing cryptocurrency exchangers and are happy to share examples of them.For example Sincerely FreeBlock.

comments.author: FreeBlock
comments.body: Cryptocurrency exchanger with automatic and semi-automatic transactions. Support for 4 blockchains. Works with payment systems and Visa, Mastercard, Unionpay cards. Scaling and changing various functions. The most detailed statistics: admin panel, account management, blacklist, ticket, content management. Multilingual support.Stack: Node.JS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel

comments.author: FreeBlock
comments.body: Another area we are working on is DeFi. DeFi (Decentralized Finance) is a system of financial instruments built on blockchain technology that allows users to exchange, lend and earn money without intermediaries such as banks and other financial institutions.DeFi uses smart contracts that automatically execute transaction conditions without the need for a third party. This provides transparency and security for transactions, as well as reduces costs for commissions and maintenance.Examples of DeFi products include decentralized exchanges (DEX), where users can exchange cryptocurrencies without intermediaries, lending and borrowing platforms for cryptocurrencies, as well as stablecoins - cryptocurrencies tied to the price of another currency or commodity.DeFi provides new opportunities for financial services and can change the traditional financial system, making it more accessible and democratic.Feel free to contact us with any questions.Yours FreeBlock!Telegram: @FreeBlockDevEmail: info@freeblock.devSite: https://freeblock.dev

comments.author: FreeBlock
comments.body: Let's talk about a relatively new trend in the world of cryptocurrency and blockchain - GameFi. GameFi combines gaming elements and financial opportunities. In GameFi, users can play various games, earn cryptocurrency, and use it for further investments.The main idea of GameFi is that players can earn cryptocurrency by completing tasks in games, selling virtual items, and participating in tournaments. This cryptocurrency can be used both to purchase in-game items and to invest in other projects.Additionally, GameFi provides the opportunity to create their own game projects on the blockchain, which can lead to the development of new ecosystems and increased interest in games in general.Therefore, GameFi represents a promising and innovative approach to the development of the gaming industry that can lead to the creation of new opportunities for players and investors. We have experience in the field of development and know all the nuances and pitfalls.Feel free to contact us, we will be happy to help you develop a turnkey project.Your FreeBlock!

comments.author: FreeBlock
comments.body: Developing NFT marketplaces has its own peculiarities that need to be taken into account. Here are some of them:1. Security: NFT marketplaces must ensure the security of users and protect their personal data.2. Transaction speed: NFT marketplaces must process transactions quickly so that users can quickly buy and sell NFTs.3. Support for different blockchains: Different NFTs can be created on different blockchains, so the marketplace must support multiple blockchains.4. Ease of use: The marketplace must be user-friendly so that users can easily find and purchase NFTs.5. Scalability: NFT marketplaces must be able to scale to handle a large number of transactions and users.6. Interoperability support: NFT marketplaces must support interoperability standards so that users can easily move their NFTs between different marketplaces and blockchains.7. Unique feature support: Some NFT marketplaces may have unique features, such as auctions or the ability to create custom NFTs, which should also be considered in development.We have extensive experience in the blockchain industry and know all the intricacies involved in developing projects. Feel free to contact us with any questions, we would be happy to help you realize your ideas.Your FreeBlock!
